name: Yotsubahou Dokugawa ~ Devil Dealing Character
description:
Just don't shoot Ryan Gosling.

Controls for Windows/Web:

  • Movement - Arrow keys
  • Shoot/ Advance text/Select - Y
  • Bomb / Skip Text - X
  • Switch shot type - C
  • Upgrade shot when enough power - V
  •  Focus (move slower + see hitbox) - Shift
  • Skip warning screen - Enter
  • Open&Close Pause Menu - P

Additional notes:

  • Original release date: 01/06/23
  • Mirage shader from https://godotengine.org/asset-library/asset/122, Swirl shader from https://www.shadertoy.com/view/Xscyzn
  • This is a work of fiction. Names, characters, businesses, places, events, locales, and incidents are either the products of the author's imagination or used in a fictitious manner. Any resemblance to actual persons, living or dead, or actual events is purely coincidental.
